the defining features of the conspiracy
theory are a conspirator the
conspiratorial plan the sinister plan
that they're trying to bring about and
the means of mass manipulation by which

secret sometimes the conspirator will be
defined in terms of a concrete body with

Illuminati or the Freemasons Jews and
more recently on things like the
Bilderberg Group Skull and Bones Society
and various other secret societies
however very often the conspirator will

global elites and so on so they're
